duties_responsibilities.duty: Supervise property management operations, leasing, marketing, and promotional activities to maximize effectiveness and achieve financial objectives.
Develop and implement operational plans to achieve or surpass cash flow objectives and maximize asset value.
Maintain personal contact with tenants, vendors, and owner representatives to ensure tenant satisfaction.
Attend merchant meetings and marketing events, distribute marketing newsletters, and assist with prospective tenant space showings.
Ensure compliance with codes, regulations, and environmental requirements, and oversee tenant improvement projects.
Respond to after-hours emergencies and resolve issues in a professional and timely manner.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree or equivalent work experience and 3+ years of Medical Office Property Management experience
